name: A E S T H E T I C boi
name_original: A E S T H E T I C boi
description:
A E S T H E T I C boi

Dive right into the world of vaporwave and surrealism as dat boi glides through the A E S T H E T I C nothingness around him.

Let your mind drift away to the old times in this fast-paced, yet calming infinite runner, as dat boi lights the way with his dimly, neon-lit presence.

by
Marin Magda makimagda@gmail.com 
Danilo Nikić danilnikic4@gmail.com
